title: Pilot
description: A laboratory accident endows a police scientist with the ability to move at superhuman speed which he uses to battle a menacing gang as a superhero.

title: Out of Control
description: Homeless people are disappearing/dying. But no one can find the bodies. Tina's friend comes to town for a visit.

title: Watching the Detectives
description: A corrupt DA hires Megan Lockhart to find out the Flash's identity. Then he blackmails Barry to work for him, or he'll expose his secret.

title: Honor Among Thieves
description: Central City Museum prepares to receive a valuable historical object. A group of specialists try to steal it.

title: Double Vision
description: Someone spreads graffiti, and messages asking to meet "Flash" at a church. Barry goes to the church. Shortly after that, he begins to experience black outs and memory losses.

title: Sins of the Father
description: A bank robber escapes from prison. He goes back to Central City to get his money and revenge on the cop who busted him, Henry Allen, Barry's father.

title: Child's Play
description: A reporter is killed as he's researching a drug story. Barry tries to help two homeless kids.

title: Shroud of Death
description: A judge is killed, the killer sends the victim a part of a medal before he dies. When a former DA is killed, Barry finds a connection. Garfield was the arresting officer on the case, when his girlfriend/fiancée is shot, Garfield takes it personally. Flash must stop him before he crosses the line. Tina gets a job offer that would send her to California

title: Ghost in the Machine
description: The Ghost, a villain from the 50's emerges from a deep freeze, intent on continuing his plan to extort money from the city. Nightshade comes out of retirement to help the Flash stop him.

title: Sight Unseen
description: An invisible man gets into Star Labs, and releases a neurotoxin with Tina inside the lab. Then he starts killing scientists who worked on the project. Flash must find the invisible man and save his friend.

title: Beat the Clock
description: A jazz musician friend of Julio's is about to be executed. An hour before the execution, a friend calls and says he has evidence that could exonerate their friend. Before Barry can contact him, he disappears. They have less than an hour to save a condemned man.

title: The Trickster
description: An insane magician wreaks havoc throughout Central City as the maniacally clever Trickster.

title: Tina, Is That You?
description: Barry is having trouble sleeping. Tina tries to use bio-feedback to help him, but it back fires on Tina. She joins a gang, and she's able to hold Flash at bay with her knowledge of his strengths and weaknesses. Barry has got to find a way to save his friend.

title: Be My Baby
description: Barry tries to help a young woman. She found out about her husband's criminal life, and is trying to escape from him. She takes their daughter with her, but he wants them back.

title: Fast Forward
description: After Pike is acquitted of his brother's murder, Barry considers moving. Pike launches a nuclear missile to kill the Flash, Flash is sent 10 years into the future where Pike is now Mayor. Flash's power's are now unstable, and Tina refuses to help him because she blames him for leaving. He's got to find a way to get back to his own time.

title: The Deadly Nightshade
description: There's a new vigilante in town, the Deadly Nightshade, he fights crime by killing criminals. Flash and the original Nightshade team up to take him down.

title: Captain Cold
description: The Flash is targeted by a hit-man who uses cold based weaponry.

title: Twin Streaks
description: A scientist and his business partner are trying to develop a being with super speed, their attempts fail. They manage to clone the Flash. Their creation learns quickly, but is emotional moral equivalent of a child. Barry must stop his twin.

title: Done with Mirrors
description: A battery is stolen by a criminal calling himself the Mirror Master. He soon steals a crystal from Star Labs. Tina will get fired if they can't recover the crystal. Tina's mother comes for a visit, and an old friend of Barry's also stirs up trouble.

title: Good Night, Central City
description: A small time crook gets a hold of a device that puts people to sleep. He goes on a spree while the people are unconscious. He has a plan to knock out the entire city, it's up to the Flash to stop him.

title: Alpha
description: An android built by the government refuses to obey her orders, they want to use her as an assassin. She escapes, and is befriend by Tina and Barry. They try to help her.

title: Trial of the Trickster
description: With the help of an insane admirer who wants to be his sidekick, the Trickster escapes from police custody and places the Flash under his mind control.
